thread.section_title: PromGirl Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PromGirl | www.promgirl.com | 11 of 523
thread.title: Tasha Gaddy

author: Tasha Gaddy
title: Tasha Gaddy
text: Honestly I was nervous about purchasing from a website that I only stumbled across through google search- but made my purchase after reading reviews and clarifying the return policy. PromGirl calmed my fears with an expediated delivery with a dress exactly as described. Their size chart helped pick out the perfect fit and we are truly excited about the upcoming event for my daughter to wear this dress!!! We now know exactly where to shop for dresses for all our special events
